resources.string: This app will read out your incoming text messages to you when you have your earphones/headphones on.
For example, if you get a whatsapp message from a friend named Bob, this app will read out \"Whatsapp message from Bob\"
Swipe to the next page for instructions on setting it up->
Switch ON the accessibility settings for TextWhisper as shown in the picture on the right. Click on the button below and it\'ll take you there!
Thats it! TextWhisper is all set up. Just close this menu and continue what you were doing!!
TW has stopped. Come back here to switch it ON whenever you feel like you need it.
Read out through phone speaker as well?
